Timeline

A short summary of my experiences

2024 - Present

Software Design, Application to Predict Rate of Fuel

For the spring semester, I am working with a group to create an application consisting of a frontend and backend to predict the rate of fuel based on client info, gallons requested, and company profit margin.

August - December 2023

Data Science and Machine Learning, Analysis on the Adoption of Electric Vehicles

For the fall semester, I worked closely with a group in order to complete a project analyzing data involving attributing factors to the availability and usage of electric vehicles. In doing so, we worked with multiple linear regression and regression tree methods.

June - August 2023

Mama La's, Helper/Intern

For the summer of 2023, I was a helper/intern at Mama La. During my time there I gained real world experience of the flexibility and problem solving skills necessary to accomplish tasks. This includes the process of diagnosing a problem and approaching it with multiple possible solutions.

August - December 2022

Kohl's, Retail Sales Associate

Initially hired for the curbside pick-up position, my time at Kohl's consisted of balancing time with other positions to support the severe understaffing. This helped me improve in my ability to work in a group setting while under pressure. In doing so, this fostered my ability to manage time and flexibilty having to balance Amazon returns, both in-store and curbside pick-ups, and many other tasks.
